explanation: The original code used p.index(x), which returns a 0-based index. Many problems expect a 1-based position, so the printed value was off by one. I fixed the single incorrect line by adding 1 to the result: print(p.index(x) + 1). No other lines were changed.
fixed_code:
n, x = map(int, input().split())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))
print(p.index(x) + 1)
